<line: 12> If the defendant is a state, county, municipal (city, town or village) or other local.
<line: 13> governmental agency, plaintiff further alleges discrimination on the basis of race, color,
<line: 14> or national origin (42 U.S.C. $ 1983).
<line: 15> 11.
<line: 16> Jurisdiction over the statutory violation alleged is conferred as follows: for Title VII
<line: 17> claims by 28 U.S.C.1331, 28 U.S.C.$1343(a)(3), and 42 U.S.C.$2000e-5(f)(3); for
<line: 18> 42 U.S.C.$1981 and $1983 by 42 U.S.C.$1988; for the A.D.E.A. by 42 U.S.C.$12117;
<line: 19> for the Rehabilitation Act, 29 U.S.C. s 791.

[TITLE]
<line: 26> THE EEOC IS CLOSING ITS FILE ON THIS CHARGE FOR THE FOLLOWING REASON:

[TEXT]
<line: 28> The facts alleged in the charge fail to state a claim under any of the statutes enforced by the EEOC.

[TEXT]
<line: 30> Your allegations did not involve a disability as defined by the Americans With Disabilities Act.

[TEXT]
<line: 32> The Respondent employs less than the required number of employees or is not otherwise covered by the statutes.

[ABANDON]

[TEXT]
<line: 35> The EEOC has adopted the findings of the state or local fair employment practices agency that investigated this charge.

[TITLE]
<line: 37> - NOTICE OF SUIT RIGHTS -

[TEXT]
<line: 39> (See the additional information attached to this form.)

[TEXT]
<line: 41> Title Vll, the Americans with Disabilities Act, the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act, or the Age
<line: 42> Discrimination in Employment Act: This will be the only notice of dismissal and of your right to sue that we will send you.
<line: 43> You may file a lawsuit against the respondent(s) under federal law based on this charge in federal or state court. Your.
<line: 44> lawsuit must be filed WITHIN 90 DAYS of your receipt of this notice; or your right to sue based on this charge will be
<line: 45> Iost. (The time limit for filing suit based on a claim under state law may be different.).

[TEXT]
<line: 47> Equal Pay Act (EPA): EPA suits must be filed in federal or state court within 2 years (3 years for willful violations) of the
<line: 48> alleged EPA underpayment. This means that backpay due for any violations that occurred more than 2 years (3 years)
<line: 49> before you file suit may not be collectible..

[FIGURE]
<line: 51> On behalf of the Commission.
<line: 52> 7/4/7
<line: 53> Julianne Bowman,
<line: 54> Date Mailed
<line: 55> District Director

<line: 56> A
<line: 57> OTHER (Specify)
<line: 58> CONTINUING ACTION
<line: 59> THE PARTICULARS ARE (f additional paper is needed, attach extra sheet(s)):
<line: 60> I began my employment with Respondent in or around December 2015. My most recent position was
<line: 61> Project Assistant. During my employment, I was subjected to sexual harassment which I rebuffed. I was
<line: 62> then demoted and had responsibilities taken away from me. I was also subjected to derogatory comments
<line: 63> regarding my accent. I complained to no avail. Subsequently, I was discharged on or about January 25,
<line: 64> 2017 while younger, less experienced employees were not.
<line: 65> I believe that I have been discriminated against because of my sex, female, and national origin Russian, and
<line: 66> retaliated against for engaging in protected activity,in violation or Titie Vli of tne Civil Rignts Act oi 1964, as
<line: 67> amended.
<line: 68> JJL13 2017
<line: 69> I believe that I have been discriminated against because of my age, 52 (Y0B:1965), and retaliated against
<line: 70> for engaging in protected activity, in violation of the Age Discrimination in Employment Act Of196z,as
<line: 71> amended.
<line: 72> I want this charge filed with both the EEOC and the State or local Agencyif any.
<line: 73> NOTARY-When necessary for State and Local Agency Requirements
<line: 74> will advise the agencies if I change my address or phone number and Iwill
<line: 75> cooperate fully with them in the processing of my charge in accordance with their
<line: 76> procedures.
<line: 77> I swear or affirm that I have read the above charge and that it is true to
<line: 78> I declare under penalty of perjury that the above is true and correo
<line: 79> the best of my knowledge information and belief.
